                <div class="ProfileSidebar ProfileSidebar--withLeftAlignment">
  <div class="ProfileHeaderCard">
  <h1 class="ProfileHeaderCard-name">
    <a href="/Martin4labour" class="ProfileHeaderCard-nameLink u-textInheritColor js-nav">Martin Jevon</a>
  </h1>

  <h2 class="ProfileHeaderCard-screenname u-inlineBlock u-dir" dir="ltr">
    <a class="ProfileHeaderCard-screennameLink u-linkComplex js-nav" href="/Martin4labour">
      <span class="username u-dir" dir="ltr">@<b class="u-linkComplex-target">Martin4labour</b></span>
    </a>
  </h2>

  

      <p class="ProfileHeaderCard-bio u-dir" dir="ltr">Martin is a Labour Activist and Campaigner, he works in a care organisation. 2017 General Election Candidate for Taunton Deane</p>

      <div class="ProfileHeaderCard-location ">
        <span class="Icon Icon--geo Icon--medium" aria-hidden="true" role="presentation"></span>
        <span class="ProfileHeaderCard-locationText u-dir" dir="ltr">
              <a href="/search?q=place%3A25d3e991f5637f5a" data-place-id="25d3e991f5637f5a">South West, England</a>

        </span>
      </div>

      <div class="ProfileHeaderCard-url  u-hidden">
        <span class="Icon Icon--url Icon--medium" aria-hidden="true" role="presentation"></span>
        <span class="ProfileHeaderCard-urlText u-dir">
</span>
      </div>

        <span class="Icon Icon--calendar Icon--medium" aria-hidden="true" role="presentation"></span>

      </div>

    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>

      <li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="863016415422423040" id="stream-item-tweet-863016415422423040" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;863016415422423040&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">As we celebrate <a href="/hashtag/InternationalNursesDay?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>InternationalNursesDay</b></a>, here's <a href="/JonAshworth" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="143212610"><s>@</s><b>JonAshworth</b></a> with our promise to all NHS staff. With us? RT  <a href="/hashtag/IND17?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>IND17</b></a><a href="https://t.co/uRL8PfSlbI" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/uRL8PfSlbI</a></p>

    </div>

        <div class="PlayableMedia-externalUrlBlockContent">
          <div class="PlayableMedia-title">Our pledge to NHS staff</div>
          <div class="PlayableMedia-description">We created the NHS  and well save the NHS. Labour will scrap the pay cap on NHS staff wages; bring back bursaries; and enshrine safe staffing levels into law. With us? Share this video.</div>

        <div class="feedback-action" data-feedback-type="DontLike" data-feedback-url="">
          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.
            <span class="undo-action">Undo</span>
          </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="child-feedback-confirmation">
      <div class="child-confirmation-item">
        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>
        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>

        <div class="feedback-action" data-feedback-type="DontLike" data-feedback-url="">
          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.
            <span class="undo-action">Undo</span>

      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Like</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>

  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo js-actionButton js-actionRetweet" data-modal="ProfileTweet-retweet" type="button">

          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.
            <span class="undo-action">Undo</span>

    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">2</span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo js-actionButton js-actionRetweet" data-modal="ProfileTweet-retweet" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo retweet">
      <span class="Icon Icon--medium Icon--retweet"></span>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Retweeted</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">2</span>

      <span class="Icon Icon--medium Icon--retweet"></span>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Retweeted</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">1</span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>

        <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">18</span>

  </button>

      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Retweeted</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>


    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--favorite js-toggleState">
  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button" aria-describedby="profile-tweet-action-favorite-count-aria-533435040429268993">

        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.
            <span class="undo-action">Undo</span>

  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>

    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">

  </span>

  </button>

        <div class="feedback-action" data-feedback-type="DontLike" data-feedback-url="">
          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.
            <span class="undo-action">Undo</span>

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/Martin4labour" data-user-id="1608015174">

      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">1</span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>


    

    

  </div>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button>

        <span class="u-hiddenVisually">More</span>
      </div>
  </button>
  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>

  </div>
  <ul>

      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">1</span>

    <div class="content">

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/Martin4labour" data-user-id="1608015174">

  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton u-textUserColorHover dropdown-toggle js-dropdown-toggle" type="button" aria-haspopup="true">
      <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="More">
        <span class="Icon Icon--caretDownLight Icon--small"></span>
        <span class="u-hiddenVisually">More</span>

  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>

  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">

      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Like</span>

  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">An nhs forthe future debate at <a href="/hashtag/unison2014?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>unison2014</b></a> Evidence that the ConDem govt have failed the nhs <a href="/SomersetUNISON" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="452429988"><s>@</s><b>SomersetUNISON</b></a> <a href="/SWLabourParty" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="1496064870"><s>@</s><b>SWLabourParty</b></a> <a href="/SomersetLabour" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="952496665"><s>@</s><b>SomersetLabour</b></a></p>

</div>


    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--favorite js-toggleState">

      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero ">
        <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
      </span>
  </button>
</div>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>

    </div>

  </div>

  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton u-textUserColorHover dropdown-toggle js-dropdown-toggle" type="button" aria-haspopup="true">
      <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="More">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Labour will scrap the gagging law.     <div class="dropdown">
  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton u-textUserColorHover dropdown-toggle js-dropdown-toggle" type="button" aria-haspopup="true">
      <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="More">

        <span class="u-hiddenVisually">More</span>
      </div>
  </button>
  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">

      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Thoroughly looking forward to working with <a href="/tauntonmayor" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="1413420090"><s>@</s><b>tauntonmayor</b></a> Libby Lisgo, <a href="/kubesix" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="80571639"><s>@</s><b>kubesix</b></a> &amp; <a href="/howardjones" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="18972140"><s>@</s><b>howardjones</b></a> on <a href="/ToneTalent" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="2412916508"><s>@</s><b>ToneTalent</b></a> in April <a href="/hashtag/tonetalent?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>tonetalent</b></a></p>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Super night with Libby <a href="/tauntonmayor" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="1413420090"><s>@</s><b>tauntonmayor</b></a> watching Killing of Sister George <a href="/TMAC_Taunton" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="76686543"><s>@</s><b>TMAC_Taunton</b></a> <a href="/TauntonThespian" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="870292646"><s>@</s><b>TauntonThespian</b></a> Some tickets still left for Saturday</p>

      </div>
    </div>

          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.
            <span class="undo-action">Undo</span>
          </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="child-feedback-confirmation">
      <div class="child-confirmation-item">
        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>
        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>

      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">

        <span class="Icon Icon--caretDownLight Icon--small"></span>
        <span class="u-hiddenVisually">More</span>
      </div>
  </button>
  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>

      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">

</div>

  </div>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>

            <span class="undo-action">Undo</span>
          </div>
        </div>

      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">And we're now up to 8 <a href="/hashtag/LGBTLabour?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>LGBTLabour</b></a> members selected in key marginal seats. Lots of campaigning to do and fundraising for the <a href="/hashtag/ChrisSmithList?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>ChrisSmithList</b></a></p>
</div>

    <span class="help-text">Under 100 characters, optional</span>

      </label>
      <label class="t1-label" for="list-private-radio">

        <b>Private</b>  Only you can access this list
      </label>
    </div>

    <script nonce="" id="track-ttft-body-script">
  if(window.ttft){
    window.ttft.recordMilestone('page', document.getElementById('swift-page-name').getAttribute('content'));
    window.ttft.recordMilestone('section', document.getElementById('swift-section-name').getAttribute('content'));
    window.ttft.recordMilestone('client_record_time', window.ttft.now());
  }
</script>
